#-----------------------------------
### Bulbasaur ###
#-----------------------------------
Types: Grass, Poison
#-----------------------------------
# Base Stats #
HP: 45
Atk: 49
Def: 49
Sp. Atk: 65
Sp. Def: 65
Speed: 45
#-----------------------------------
Abilities: Overgrow
Hidden Ability: Chlorophyll
#-----------------------------------
# Moves learnt by level up #
Lv. 1:   Tackle
Lv. 1:   Growl
Lv. 3:   Vine Whip
Lv. 6:   Growth
Lv. 7:   Leech Seed
Lv. 12:  Razor Leaf
Lv. 13:  Poison Powder
Lv. 13:  Sleep Powder
Lv. 15:  Take Down
Lv. 18:  Seed Bomb
Lv. 21:  Sweet Scent
Lv. 27:  Double-Edge
Lv. 27:  Synthesis
Lv. 30:  Worry Seed
Lv. 36:  Solar Beam

Egg Groups: Monster, Grass
Steps required to hatch a Bulbasaur egg: 5120
#-----------------------------------
# Evolutions #
Ivysaur - Obtained by levelling up Bulbasaur to at least level 16.

Leafeon - Obtained by levelling up Eevee near a Mossy Rock.
Sylveon - Obtained by having max friendship with Eevee while it has a Fairy type move.
Espeon - Obtained by having high friendship with Eevee during the day (5:00am - 7:59pm).

#-----------------------------------

Egg Groups: Undiscovered
Steps required to hatch a Riolu egg: 1000
#-----------------------------------
# Evolutions #
Lucario - Obtained by having high friendship with Riolu during the day (5:00am - 7:59pm).
#-----------------------------------

### Sobble ###
#-----------------------------------
Types: Water
#-----------------------------------
# Base Stats #
HP: 50
Atk: 40
Def: 40
Sp. Atk: 70
Sp. Def: 40
Speed: 70
#-----------------------------------
Abilities: Torrent
Hidden Ability: Sniper
#-----------------------------------
# Moves learnt by level up #
Lv. 1:   Pound
Lv. 1:   Growl
Lv. 6:   Water Gun
Lv. 8:   Bind
Lv. 12:  Water Pulse
Lv. 17:  Tearful Look
Lv. 20:  Sucker Punch
Lv. 24:  U-turn
Lv. 28:  Liquidation
Lv. 32:  Soak
Lv. 36:  Rain Dance
#-----------------------------------
# Moves learnt by TM #
Attract
Aqua Jet
Dive
Double Team
Facade
Hidden Power
Protect
Rain Dance
Reflect
Rest
Safeguard
Substitute
Toxic
U-turn
Work Up

# Move Tutor moves #
Bind
Bounce
Endure
Sleep Talk
Snore
Sucker Punch
Swift
Water Pledge
#-----------------------------------
# Egg Moves #
Aqua Jet
Aqua Ring
Double Team
Fell Stinger
Haze
Ice Shard
Mist
#-----------------------------------
Egg Groups: Water 1, Field
Steps required to hatch a Sobble egg: 5396
#-----------------------------------
# Evolutions #
Drizzile - Obtained by levelling up Sobble to at least level 16.
#-----------------------------------
